InitBlock.name: CURRENT_FCST_DATE

DBMapItem.name: DB2V7
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT CASE WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)' = 'N/A' THEN (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.FCST_DT < CURRENT TIMESTAMP) ELSE (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.ROW_ID IN (SELECT F.FCSTSER_DATE_ID FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCST F WHERE F.OWNER_POSTN_ID = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)') AND FSD.FCST_DT < CURRENT TIMESTAMP) END FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_DUAL

DBMapItem.name: DefaultMulDB
DBMapItem.Value: SELECT CASE WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)' = 'N/A' THEN (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.FCST_DT < SYSDATE) ELSE (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.ROW_ID IN (SELECT F.FCSTSER_DATE_ID FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCST F WHERE F.OWNER_POSTN_ID = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)') AND FSD.FCST_DT < SYSDATE) END FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_DUAL

InitBlock.InitString: SELECT CASE WHEN 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)' = 'N/A' THEN (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.FCST_DT < SYSDATE) ELSE (SELECT MAX(FSD.FCST_DT) FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCSTSER_DATE FSD WHERE FSD.ROW_ID IN (SELECT F.FCSTSER_DATE_ID FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_FCST F WHERE F.OWNER_POSTN_ID = 'VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.PRIMARY_POSTN_ID)') AND FSD.FCST_DT < SYSDATE) END FROM VALUEOF(TBO).S_DUAL
